column4: i downloaded compiz configuration thing, and i set the effect to blur....now i can only see black windows xD anyone got any suggestions? should i go to the failsafe terminal and uninstall the configuarion tool?
anyone know the command for an uninstall?
autoremove will remove all "orphaned" packages whilst remove will uninstall the packages you request
how is it broken? Please be specific

ive written it before: i downloaded compiz configuration thing, and i set the effect to blur....now i can only see black windows xD anyone got any suggestions? should i go to the failsafe terminal and uninstall the configuarion tool?
removing the configuration tool won't do anything
no, press ctrl+alt+F1 to get to a VT. Press ctrl+alt+f7 to get back
wont that show up as black too
does ls -la | grep compiz return anything when you are in your homedir?
so i type Is -la | grep compiz
